name: Car Racing Browser Game
description:
Note: This is the browser version of 'Car Racing' for Windows and Mac.  If you want to download the game for your Android phone, see here.

Note: The game may take a while to load!

More simulation than racing, but making fun though. Try it! 

Short instruction:

  •  2 light modes available: day and night mode (change it by light bulb in right-upper corner)
  • 4 quality levels ('low' or 'very low' recommend)
  • Special: controller mode. Play it with:
    •  keypad (default setting) 
    • PS4 (activating with X key) or 
    • Xbox controller (activating with C key). 
  • If you have technical problems, try Unity game version for Windows and Mac instead

Have fun!
